title: Cholamandalam Investment & Finance Company Ltd rises for fifth straight session - Business Standard
content: Cholamandalam Investment & Finance Company Ltd rises for fifth straight session  Business Standard
description: Cholamandalam Investment & Finance Company Ltd is quoting at Rs 672.15, up 0.1% on the day as on 12:49 IST on the NSE. The stock is up 25.65% in last one year as compared to a 12.3% jump in NIFTY and a 0.62% jump in the Nifty Financial Services.
